Hello!

Nice to meet you.

Full Stack Developer with one year of professional experience well acquainted with collaboration. Strong understanding of Software Development Life Cycle, Data Structures, OOPS concepts.

designer

Implemented a movie rental application mimicking functionalities of IMDB(Internet Movie Database). Developed the backend of Movies Rental Shop, deployed on Heroku and is built using Express, MongoDB, Fawn, Lodash, etc and unit and integration testing is done using Jest. Technologies: ES6, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDb, Mongoose, JWS Token, Jest, Heroku
